The Linux philosophy is 'Laugh in the face of danger'. Oops. Wrong One. 'Do it yourself'. Yes, that's it.|Linus Torvalds||U
The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall.|Mitch Hedberg||U
Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it.|Maya Angelou||U
They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.|Ben Franklin||U
